name: Umineko: Golden Fantasia
description: The tag-team fighting game based on the original "Umineko When They Cry" series, finally released on Steam, in English and with improved rollback netplay!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: Intel Core 2/Core 2 Quad/Core i3/i5/i7 GPU Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7600GT/8500GT/9400GT/GT220 Or Better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2500 MB available space
